reviewtext: i wanted a small radio with a speaker, having given up on wearing headphones, carefully read the reviews and got the sony S10mk2 and this panasonic RF P50.  both are what i remember as about "10 transister radios" although both are probably printed circuits by now.  the sony is much less directional than the panasonic when placed in an "almost dead" reception area of my office and brought in clear programs (15 miles from the transmitter) while the panasonic had to be carefully placed to get a similar sound.
summary: not as good as the sony s10mk2, directional static
